ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious Factions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess i ll have to raise/lower them equally and hope the raises are bigger then the lowers, eventually *might* end up amiable 8)  No bone chips quests by any
ygData.messageBody:
I guess i'll have to raise/lower them equally and hope the raises are bigger
then the lowers, eventually *might* end up amiable 8) No bone chips quests
by any chance huh? 8)

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: December 21, 2000 3:05 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious Factions?


Not that I have found. The Giant quest I did lowered dwarf and the dwarf
quest lowered giant...

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 1:03 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious Factions?


ya but question is... which is the most valuable to keep... dragon or dwarf
or giant. I'm assuming 2 out of 3 to keep. I'm just wondering if there's a
way to raise factions without lowering the others, but probably isnt

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: December 21, 2000 2:49 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious Factions?


Killing Giants raises dwarves and dragons, I aimagine killing dwarves would
raise giants and dragons but am not sure. I also imagine that killing
dragons will raise dwarves and giants. Seems like you basically choose one
faction to hurt out of the three. Note that the minus faction hits are more
significant than the plus hits so you can't kill the same number of giants
and dwarves without expecting to be KoS to both.

Kit


To you all that have been to Velious... Which factions are you watching out
for?

from the little that I've been/understand of it is that you kill 1 other 2
like you and so on

Dragons/Giants/Dwarves
